remarks: If two closed subspaces of a Hilbert space are orthogonal, their subspace sum equals their subspace join.  Lemma 3 of [Kalmbach] p. 67. Note that the (countable) Axiom of Choice is used for this proof via ~ pjhth , although "the hard part" of this proof, ~ chscl , requires no choice.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
